title: English Wikipedia
summary: The English Wikipedia is the English-language edition of Wikipedia, an online encyclopedia. It was founded on 15 January 2001 as Wikipedia's first edition and, as of OctoberÂ 2021, has the most articles of any edition, at 6,418,199.[1] As of December 2021, 11% of articles in all Wikipedias belong to the English-language edition. This share was more than 50% in 2003.[2][3] The edition's one-billionth edit was made on 13 January 2021.[4]
